callpappers_data.title: Summer. Sea. JavaScript.
callpappers_data.description:
Enjoy Odessa together with 500+ international participants and share your knowledge with the community.

Welcome to submit your talk and get ready for 2 days of endless fun and be one of the 20+ speakers of the greatest summer Ukrainian JS gatheringüòä

about_data.subtitle: SUNNY PLACE WHERE JAVASCRIPT COMMUNITY COMES TOGETHER

tickets_data.subtitle: Conference On in-depth JavaScript Technologies
tickets_data.description: If you‚Äôve already visited our previous conferences you could get 20% discount. Also, you could get Diversity ticket and Students ticket. Please contact us via odessajs.info@gmail.com to receive a personal promo code.

thirdSlide.title:
**OdessaJS Seaside Open Air Weekend, August 29-30**

You can find slides of the presentations [here](https://www.slideshare.net/OdessaJSConf)

Bright photos are on Facebook [here](https://www.facebook.com/odessajs/photos/?tab=album&ref=page_internal)

Video records of speeches will be published on OdessaJS [YouTube Channel](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLUF1zRLAgrPFZPNhLsTFHrdmv0L-mWGnH)

Welcome to share your impressions, please fill in [FEEDBACK FORM](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfR2hZhyxCUaEWP00G8g1w-hZG5l1MnX6IuAOdu73FpLFYzWQ/viewform?fbclid=IwAR05H9ZsNOKQEirRwYTjwIavkBncNhaT66207lhKo62vMX88-B5MeP_BOZw)
